local_intent: Perceive the T-block, align, then perform two planar pushes (90°) of 0.1m each, retreat, and pause.
assumptions: Goal region is already perceived elsewhere in the global tree
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT by rechecking visibility, refining alignment, setting yaw to 45°, repeating Push twice with distance 0.1 and direction 90, then retreating and waiting; realizes the transfer-phase micro-goal where the active leaf is Push.
